--- title: "Probability- Assignment1" author: "Hilal Sankari" format: html: code-line-numbers: true df-print: paged --- ---- ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_dbb84d4b1bcf1f7ee8b70378e5d82043'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Load Libraries library(tidyverse) ``` ::: # **Assignment1** ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_450015afca3fb5ede531585215e727ad'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Define probabilities P_S <- 0.3 P_T_S <- 0.2 P_T_S_Bar <- 0.6 # Calculate complementary probabilities P_S_Bar <- 1 - P_S P_T_Bar_S <- 1 - P_T_S P_T_Bar_S_Bar <- 1 - P_T_S_Bar # Calculate conditional probabilities P_T_inter_S <- P_S * P_T_S P_T_inter_S_Bar <- P_S_Bar * P_T_S_Bar P_T_Bar_inter_S <- P_S * P_T_Bar_S P_T_Bar_inter_S_Bar <- P_S_Bar * P_T_Bar_S_Bar ``` ::: #### **Assignment1 Results** ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_96d2fc6f232c0d816c72ff7350ec059d'} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="true"} cat("P_T_inter_S:",P_T_inter_S) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> P_T_inter_S: 0.06 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="true"} cat("P_T_inter_S_Bar",P_T_inter_S_Bar) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> P_T_inter_S_Bar 0.42 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="true"} cat("P_T_Bar_inter_S",P_T_Bar_inter_S) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> P_T_Bar_inter_S 0.24 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="true"} cat("P_T_Bar_inter_S_Bar",P_T_Bar_inter_S_Bar) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> P_T_Bar_inter_S_Bar 0.28 ``` ::: ::: # **Assignment2** #### **Fill in the Dataset** ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_ed526d3a8d0a2ec73a720ffd7845a4fb'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Number of obervations n <- 1000 # Create tibble app_usage <- tibble( # Create user_id in increasing order user_id = 1:n, # Randomly sample if smartphone was used smartphone = rbinom(n, 1, 0.4), # Sample if tablet was used. More likely if smartphone was not used. tablet = ifelse(smartphone == 1, rbinom(n, 1, 0.2), rbinom(n, 1, 0.5)), # Sample if computer was used. More likely if tablet was not used. computer = ifelse(tablet == 1, rbinom(n, 1, 0.1), rbinom(n, 1, 0.3)) ) # If no device has value of 1, we set smartphone to 1 app_usage <- app_usage %>% rowwise() %>% mutate(smartphone = ifelse(sum(smartphone, tablet, computer) == 0, 1, smartphone)) ``` ::: #### **Preview of the Dataset** ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_497bca726257bd8c92f3b8d790132d64'} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="true"} # Show first ten lines head(app_usage, 10) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: #### **Show column sums** ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_15001e961f29b99ca325e91557b15397'} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="true"} colSums(app_usage) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> user_id smartphone tablet computer #> 500500 598 377 235 ``` ::: ::: #### **Create the sets needed** ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_a18521058a8a40f3a0c08c595e59fe7d'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Set of phone, tablet and computer users set_phon <- which(app_usage$smartphone == 1) set_tabl <- which(app_usage$tablet == 1) set_comp <- which(app_usage$computer == 1) # List of all sets sets_all <- list(set_phon, set_tabl, set_comp) ``` ::: #### **Load additional package for plotting Venn diagrams** ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_a9b6ad4012dacef34239e692a7fe6214'} ```{.r .cell-code} library(ggVennDiagram) ``` ::: #### **Plot Venn Diagram** ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-9_78572e605c36ab21a7123b4ebd628bba'} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="true"} ggVennDiagram(sets_all, category.names = c("Smartphone", "Tablet", "Computer"), label_percent_digit = 2) + # Customizing appearance theme(legend.position = "none", panel.background = element_rect("grey"), strip.background = element_rect("grey")) + scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = .24)) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](01_probability_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: #### **Assignment 2 Results** ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_0de1583a4d308557167c2bb1c3cdbce9'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Calculate the intersection of sets (users using all three devices) set_all_three <- Reduce(intersect, sets_all) percentage_all_three <- length(set_all_three) / n * 100 cat("Percentage of customers using all three devices:", round(percentage_all_three, 2), "%\n") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> Percentage of customers using all three devices: 0.4 % ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-11_f26960a2dd6256097b66510a0d202045'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Calculate the union of sets (users using at least two devices) set_at_least_two <- union(intersect(set_phon, set_tabl), union(intersect(set_phon, set_comp), intersect(set_comp, set_tabl))) percentage_at_least_two <- length(set_at_least_two) / n * 100 cat("Percentage of customers using at least two devices:", round(percentage_at_least_two, 2), "%\n") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> Percentage of customers using at least two devices: 20.6 % ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-12_04ea9c9fd71cfccb267e9b64800d0d04'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Calculate the sets of users using each device exclusively set_only_phon <- set_phon[!(set_phon %in% set_tabl) & !(set_phon %in% set_comp)] set_only_tabl <- set_tabl[!(set_tabl %in% set_phon) & !(set_tabl %in% set_comp)] set_only_comp <- set_comp[!(set_comp %in% set_phon) & !(set_comp %in% set_tabl)] percentage_only_one <- (length(set_only_phon) + length(set_only_tabl) + length(set_only_comp)) / n * 100 cat("Percentage of customers using only one device:", round(percentage_only_one, 2), "%\n") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> Percentage of customers using only one device: 79.4 % ``` ::: ::: # **Assignment2** #### **Initialize data** ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-13_312137a0b4c4a11c3951f3aa67dbc7e8'} ```{.r .cell-code} P_A <- 0.04 P_B_A <- 0.97 P_B_A_Bar <- 0.99 ``` ::: #### **Calculation** ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-14_e88c7cff6a2f2ee74fa90be3945646ed'} ```{.r .cell-code} P_A_Bar <- 1- P_A P_B_Bar_A <- 1 - P_B_A P_B_Bar_A_Bar <- 1 - P_B_A_Bar P_B <- (P_B_A*P_A)+(P_B_A_Bar*P_A_Bar) P_A_Bar_knowing_B <- (P_B_A_Bar * P_A_Bar)/P_B P_A_knowing_B <- (P_B_A * P_A)/P_B ``` ::: #### **Assignment3 Results** ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-15_bb0b895a2920270c85173025503bf0ea'} ```{.r .cell-code} print(P_A_Bar_knowing_B) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 0.9607764 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} print(P_A_knowing_B) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 0.03922362 ``` ::: :::
